column4: in what way do Firefox builds from mozilla ftp differ from Firefox Ubuntu builds?
I can reproduce an issue in 14.0.1 on mozilla's 14.0.1 build which I can't on the same version from Ubuntu
that suggests that the mozilla bundles system libraries that the ubuntu system provides for its own build
Our firefox package depends on libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0, which depends on librsvg2-2
